5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Anas bin Malik that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) entered the mosque and saw a rope tied between two pillars. He said, “What is this rope?” They said:“It belongs to Zainab. She prays here and when she gets tired she holds on to it.” He said: “Untie it, untie it; let any one of you pray when he has energy, if he gets tired let him sit down.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْمُصَلِّي إِذَا نَعَسَ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated about if the person praying becomes sleepy
